data.name: 0002 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Looks like I'm gonna be going to the staff room to get the key with Nagato and Koizumi.

data.name: 0003 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It'd be nice if we could just ask for it and they respectfully hand it over...

data.name: 0004 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Borrowing a key itself is not that much trouble.

data.name: 0005 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Really?

data.name: 0006 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Indeed. I'm confident we can find a suitable reason and persuade them to lend it to us.

data.name: 0007 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, I suppose your speaking skill is in line with an experienced politician after all.

data.name: 0008 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It truly is an honor to receive your praise.

data.name: 0009 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That wasn't supposed to be praise...

data.name: 0010 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Oh my is that right? Do excuse me then.

data.name: 0011 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Seeing Koizumi act like that beside Nagato, who was walking silently, like a mannequin...

data.name: 0012 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...it gave me this weird feeling that they were balanced, as odd as it sounds.

data.name: 0013 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: For the time being, we'll leave the key getting to you, Koizumi.

data.name: 0014 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Understood.

data.name: 0015 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'll... Hmm, right. During that time maybe I'll do some interviewing?

data.name: 0016 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi's so-called mysterious student…

data.name: 0017 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It might be quickest to ask a teacher if they know anything about past music students...

data.name: 0018 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...who won any awards.

data.name: 0019 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Nagato, do you mind tagging along with me?

data.name: 0020 (413.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Understood.

data.name: 0021 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Having sorted out our individual roles, we headed into the staff room.

data.name: 0024 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Here's the key to the music room. They lent it to us rather willingly.

data.name: 0025 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wow, I suppose I shouldn't be surprised.

data.name: 0026 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: In Koizumi's hand were the fruits--the key to the music room.

data.name: 0027 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That's one problem solved at least, I suppose?

data.name: 0028 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: How did your mission go? Were you able to learn anything?

data.name: 0029 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: While Koizumi was getting the key, we were asking questions to other teachers.

data.name: 0030 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, they told me there are no students who won any music award.

data.name: 0031 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Same for you, Nagato?

data.name: 0032 (413.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: To the extent of those teachers' recollectio- ns, no student matching those criteria exists.

data.name: 0033 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I see. That's quite a dear shame…

data.name: 0034 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Though, despite saying it's a shame, he's not acting like he's lost hope.

data.name: 0035 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Even if not in the recollections of those individuals, that doesn't rule out the...

data.name: 0036 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: ...possibility that we could fine a record elsewhere.

data.name: 0037 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, I suppose teachers will move about as time passes and stuff.

data.name: 0038 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Indeed, it is greatly plausible.

data.name: 0039 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: However, even after the student concerned had left, if they received some kind of award...

data.name: 0040 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: ...the should be a record of that somewhere.

data.name: 0041 (413.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Yes. We cannot deny the possibility that it has been left behind in the form of data.

data.name: 0042 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I guess you're probably right.

data.name: 0043 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: With that, there is one more item I'd like to confirm before we leave.

data.name: 0044 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What is it?

data.name: 0045 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: The list of alumni from the wind ensemble club. I believe it would serve us well to check it.

data.name: 0046 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: A list of alumni? Would they really be so willing to show us that?

data.name: 0047 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm sure the teachers would be suspicious of why we want such personal information.

data.name: 0048 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: You're absolutely right--These days person- al information is handled with extreme delicacy.

data.name: 0049 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Exactly. I feel like if we waste our time asking for something like that...

data.name: 0050 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...there's a chance we'll get into something more bothersome than I want to deal with...

data.name: 0051 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hmm...

data.name: 0052 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Even if it is does sound hopeless, it'd be great if we could pull it off, right?

data.name: 0053 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I guess it does kind of interest me.

data.name: 0054 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I think we should give it a shot.

data.name: 0055 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: In that case, I'll see if the teacher I talked to earlier is willing to cooperate.

data.name: 0056 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I believe with some well executed phrasing they may perhaps be willing to lend it to us.

data.name: 0057 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I guess Koizumi really comes in handy when it comes to this kind of thing.

data.name: 0058 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I hope you don't mind, but I'm leaving it up to you.

data.name: 0060 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: We sent off Koizumi and waited only a few minutes.

data.name: 0061 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I return, having acquired the list.

data.name: 0062 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey, that was pretty fast now.

data.name: 0063 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Well, I'm rather used to such errands.

data.name: 0064 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: No kidding--His experience points are on another order of magnitude compared to me.

data.name: 0065 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: This is the "#P05register of alumni#P00." I'll leave this in your hands.

data.name: 0066 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Thanks.

data.name: 0067 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Getting something so seemingly important so easily--Koizumi isn't to be trifled with.

data.name: 0068 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'll check this list out later.

data.name: 0069 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Nah, let's not.

data.name: 0070 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm not sure how we could use it, plus I don't want to go through any thorough questioning.

data.name: 0071 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Are you sure? I thought it was quite a good idea…

data.name: 0072 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Next to Koizumi--who seemed to be wearing a dejected smile--Nagato was holding something.

data.name: 0073 (413.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Here.

data.name: 0074 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hm? Nagato, what is that?

data.name: 0075 (413.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: This alone was sticking out on the shelf with the student registers.

data.name: 0076 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Let's see? Hm? Is this "#P05some kind of award#P00"?

data.name: 0077 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's an old-looking certificate, so the letters are faded and hard to read...

data.name: 0078 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: But perhaps it has some connection to our case?

data.name: 0079 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I suppose even if we can't get a list of alumni, we can take this.

data.name: 0080 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I shouldn't have to say this, but the beautiful genius pianist girl that died a death of...

data.name: 0081 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...regret or whatever it is Haruhi talks about obviously doesn't exist.

data.name: 0082 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It looks like we need to convince Haruhi of that fact, but...

data.name: 0083 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: How do we actually go about doing that... you know?

data.name: 0084 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I guess we can think about that before we go back to give her the key.

data.name: 0085 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Koizumi, how do you think it'd go if we told Haruhi...

data.name: 0086 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ...what the teacher just told us?

data.name: 0087 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Well, I suppose there's no reason to check, but I thought I'd at least ask his opinion.

data.name: 0088 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Hmm, let's see. I'm certain Miss Suzumiya would be delighted.

data.name: 0089 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …For sure...

data.name: 0090 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If she comes to learn that the teachers have never heard of such a student...

data.name: 0091 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...rather than giving up, she'd assume the truth is being hidden or something...

data.name: 0092 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That's just the type of person Haruhi Suzumiya is.

data.name: 0093 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: For starters, we need enough information that rules out Haruhi's delusional tale.

data.name: 0094 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Indeed, facts are facts, after all.

data.name: 0095 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Don't you agree, Nagato?

data.name: 0096 (413.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: We need to present Haruhi Suzumiya with more substantial and credible information.

data.name: 0097 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That's right, and in that case…

data.name: 0098 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Maybe we should ask around more--like people other than teachers?

data.name: 0099 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: If we do some asking around with the locals, I'm sure we can easily find stuff out...

data.name: 0100 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ...that rules out Haruhi's baseless delusion.

data.name: 0101 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Indeed, under normal circumstances I agree that it's a great idea, but…

data.name: 0102 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Something wrong with it?

data.name: 0103 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I don't believe we have the time to carry out some off-campus interviewing.

data.name: 0104 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Not to mention, even if we were fortunate enough to come into contact with locals...

data.name: 0105 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: ...I'm not sure how long it would take us to obtain any usable information…

data.name: 0106 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I suppose, if we end up getting captured by a talkative elderly person who...

data.name: 0107 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ...has us talk with them over tea or something, we won't learn anything.

data.name: 0108 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Indeed, the chance is high.

data.name: 0109 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That would be unbearable.

data.name: 0110 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It might be best to come up with something like that ourselves then.

data.name: 0111 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: You mean fabricating a story? I suppose that's not bad.

data.name: 0112 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: When it comes to well crafted stories...

data.name: 0113 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: ...on occasion, they can have a greater sense of realism than genuine true stories.

data.name: 0114 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah, I suppose. Then... how about something like this?

data.name: 0115 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I came up with a somewhat fitting story and told the other two.

data.name: 0116 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …So with that having happened, the pianist got the award...

data.name: 0117 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ...and therefore had no regrets.

data.name: 0118 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Hmm, I see. So that's the sort of outline you're going for.

data.name: 0119 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah, if we work on it we can improve its credibility…

data.name: 0120 (413.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: However, that story has countless inconsistencies.

data.name: 0121 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Huh? Is that right?

data.name: 0122 (413.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Yes. The first consistency is…

data.name: 0123 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: This time it was Nagato handing out criticisms.

data.name: 0124 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: R-right…

data.name: 0125 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It feels like whenever things seem to be going well, one of these two calmly butts in.

data.name: 0126 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm grateful for their cooperation, but at this rate...

data.name: 0127 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...we're never gonna make any progress...

data.name: 0128 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I wish they'd consider that at least a little.

data.name: 0129 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Nagato, I'm grateful, but...

data.name: 0130 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ...it would help if you put a limit on the jabs...

data.name: 0132 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: With Nagato's head tilted a few millimeters to the side, she fell silent as if...

data.name: 0133 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...she'd stopped functioning.

data.name: 0134 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, jabs are sort of like conversational responses…

data.name: 0135 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Like saying "what are you talking about?" when someone says something odd.

data.name: 0136 (413.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Pointing out errors in the subject of the conversation and calling attention to them.

data.name: 0137 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It's nothing that formal…

data.name: 0138 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Look, it's my bad. It's not a big deal so don't worry about it.

data.name: 0139 (413.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: …I see.

data.name: 0140 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Koizumi, I appreciate the advice, but could you keep it on moderation somewhat?

data.name: 0141 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Otherwise it just makes me needlessly confused.

data.name: 0142 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: How unsavory of me.

data.name: 0143 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: However, I'm also putting in my greatest efforts because I want to support you.

data.name: 0144 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Stop it with the gross phrasing.

data.name: 0145 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Oh my, how cold of you.

data.name: 0146 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Naturally.

data.name: 0147 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I definitely don't want our conversation to be hot.

data.name: 0148 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm gonna calm myself down and come up with a new idea.

data.name: 0149 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Okay so this time, we'll tell Haruhi…

data.name: 0150 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Ah, I beg your pardon, but that's...

data.name: 0151 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What now? I haven't even said anything yet.

data.name: 0152 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: There's absolutely no way that wasn't too soon to interrupt...

data.name: 0153 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I'm afraid that's not my issue.

data.name: 0154 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Then what do you mean?

data.name: 0155 (413.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: …The time.

data.name: 0156 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Nagato lightly raised her arm and pointed at the clock in the hallway.

data.name: 0157 (413.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Guh--It's already this late? Not good--We need to get back fast.

data.name: 0158 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Indeed, if we take too long...

data.name: 0159 (413.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: ...we'll only dampen Miss Suzumiya's mood.

data.name: 0160 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Damn it--Running out of time when we're totally unprepared, huh.

data.name: 0161 (413.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I give up.

data.name: 0162 (413.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: See if they'll show us the alumni list

data.name: 0163 (413.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Don't bother

data.name: 0164 (413.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Complain to Nagato

data.name: 0165 (413.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Complain to Koizumi
